original_text: And the king said to the man of God, “Entreat now the favor of the Lord your God, and pray for me, that my hand may be restored to me.” And the man of God entreated the Lord, and the king's hand was restored to him and became as it was before.
korean_text: 왕이 하나님의 사람에게 말하여 이르되 청하건대 너는 나를 위하여 네 하나님 여호와께 은혜를 구하여 내 손이 다시 성하게 기도하라 하나님의 사람이 여호와께 은혜를 구하니 왕의 손이 다시 성하도록 전과 같이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And the king said to the man of God,
Entreat now the favor of the Lord your God,
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 당신의 하나님 여호와의 은혜를 구하고,

sentences.original_text: that my hand may be restored to me.”
And the man of God entreated the Lord,
and the king's hand was restored to him
